resources.string: The best way to add weight is to increase the consumption of complex carbohydrates (carbohydrates). They are basically foods in integral form, as integral bread, oats, muesli and brown rice.
People whose BMI is between 20 and 25 possess an ideal weight, associated with a longer life, lower serious illnesses, as well as being perceived as more physically attractive.

Body weight is controlled by the number of calories consumed and the amount of calories burned each day. So, if you consume fewer calories than you burn, you will lose weight. You can do it by being more physically active.
